programme.desc: Minggu ini jom masak bersama Ahmad Syamim & kakaknya untuk menampilkan resepi dari mereka. Jom Masak adalah sebuah rancangan masakan melibatkan Pemain Bola Sepak bagi setiap episod . Ia turut diselitkan dengan unsur sketsa dan komedi untuk menjadikan rancangan ini lebih menarik dan menghiburkan penonton . Rancangan ini turut memberikan tip masakan kepada penonton mengikut petua-petua dalam menyediakan masakan yang enak.

programme.title: Mek Gyver
programme.desc: Munah dan Idris mempunyai seorang anak perempuan yang bernama Zarra. Zarra mempunyai kemahiran bertukang. Zarra bercita-cita untuk menjadi seorang engineer dan merupakan graduan dari sebuah universiti. Jenab merupakan kawan baik Zarra dari kecil dan mengetahui semua minat Zarra. Zarra berkenalan dengan Aris setelah membantu Aris membaiki motor Aris. Zarra terkenal setelah membantu mak cik Gayah untuk membaiki kepala paip air di rumahnya yang pecah. Leman tukang tidak berpuas hati dengan Zarra kerana menganggap Zarra mencantas periuk nasinya. Senah memanggil Zarra untuk membaiki singki rumahnya yang bocor tetapi Zainal anak Senah tidak bersetuju memanggil Zarra kerana Zarra seorang perempuan.

programme.title: Jom Jalan
programme.desc: Bersama Jom Jalan kali ini Black Hanifah akan membawa para penonton ke Pulau Sibu. Jom Jalan musim kali ini membawa Selebriti tanah air ke pulau-pulau menarik yang ada di Malaysia. Pada setiap pelbagai destinasi menarik akan dipaparkan meliputi lokasi aktivi ketika percutian, makanan dan tempat-tempat menarik yang sesuai dikunjungi.

programme.title: #ustazmasak
programme.desc: Rancangan ini menampilkan pengacara Fendi Mohammad yang akan mengembara ke destinasi riadah menarik bersama seorang ustaz jemputan. Berkonsepkan 'outdoor cooking', rancangan ini membawakan resepi ringkas namun sedap yang akan dimasak bersama Fendi Mohammad dan Ustaz jemputan. programme.title: Selamat Datang Cinta
programme.desc: semula. Tapi Hafiz bukanlah seorang lelaki yang mudah mengaku kalah begitu saja. Hampir setiap hari dia akan muncul di café itu, merayu Ariana dan meminta maaf atas kesilapannya yang telah mengkhianati cinta mereka suatu ketika dulu. Meski Ariana tak mahu menimbangkan langsung permintaan Hafiz itu, tapi lain pula halnya dengan Aryani yang tak tahu punca sebenar perhubungan Ariana dan Hafiz terputus sebelum ini. Aryani kesian melihat Hafiz yang bersungguh-sungguh mahu mendapatkan cinta Ariana semula sehingga sanggup merayu Aryani agar memujukkan Ariana untuknya.

programme.title: Encik Ustaz
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang seorang jejaka yang bernama Faradi, terpaksa berbohong mengenai dirinya seorang bekas pelajar tahfiz dan bekerja di jabatan agama demi memikat seorang gadis yang bernama Atikah. Melaui pembohongan itu, Atikah menggelar Faradi sebagai ' Encik Ustaz'. Apakah yang akan terjadi kepada hubungan Faradi dan Atikah?

Episod kali ini akan diteruskan ke bandar Yogyakarta dengan suasana desanya. Misi perjalanan lapan jam kali ini adalah untuk membawa penonton ke pusat pengeluaran batik di Indonesia.

programme.desc: Episod pada kali ini bersama Online Hot iaitu Ekyn (Astro Gempak), Tuan Hafis (Mstar), dan Haikal (Metro). Rancangan berkonsepkan program realiti 'game show' secara santai dan terbuka bersama pengacara anda Afieq Shazwan dan Syamim Farid dan 3 orang peserta setiap episod yang terdiri daripada selebriti dan instafemes, youtuber, wartawan dan institusi-institusi.

programme.title: Ceritaku
programme.desc: Ceritaku adalah sebuah program realiti mengisahkan seorang wartawan hiburan bernama Siti Khadijah yang prihatin dengan keadaan sekeliling dan ingin membantu insan-insan yang tidak berkemampuan. Siti Khadijah yang peka dengan kesusahan mereka yang tidak bernasib baik ini akan mencari VIP dan usahawan untuk membantu meringankan beban insan-insan yang tidak berkemampuan ini.

programme.title: Umar Hatta
programme.desc: Ketika Leyla sedang menangis sendirian di lobi hospital, dia telah berkenalan dengan Nadia, wanita muslimah yang menarik Leyla kembali ke jalan yang lurus lagi benar. Dengan mengingat Tuhan, Leyla mula menemui ketenangan. Dia juga mampu mengawal diri dan melupakan kekhilafan suaminya, malah berusaha memujuk Hatta agar bertaubat. Berkat bimbingan Nadia dan suaminya, Dr. Farhan, Leyla dan Hatta mampu berubah. Gaya hidup bebas yang mereka jalani sebelum ini digantikan dengan gaya hidup berlandaskan sunnah. Jika sebelum ini mereka hanya solat bila ada masa, tapi kini mereka mengutamakan masa solat dari lain-lain perkara.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Hilang
programme.desc: Setelah berbulan-bulan kehilangan Hamidah, mereka sekeluarga dikejutkan dengan berita daripada pihak polis bahawa mereka terjumpa rangka manusia di sekitar trek jogging Hamidah. Polis mengesyaki bahawa rangka yang dijumpa tesebut adalah rangka Hamidah dengan bukti yang dijumpai.

programme.title: Jalan Lain Menuju Surga
programme.desc: Yosan dan Dadang merupakan penjual tepi jalan dan mereka berniaga bersama serta berjiran hanya bersebelahan rumah. Yosan mengesyaki Dadang seorang pencuri kerana rezeki yang tidak putus-putus melimpahi dirinya walaupun dia hanya seorang penjual tepi jalan. Namun, semua itu merupakan salah faham.

Kenderaan adalah satu keperluan penting untuk seharian kita, bahkan di negara kemboja motorsikal merupakan satu keperluan dan kesemestian di negara ini. Di anggarkan terdapat lebih 3 juta motorsikal bergerak di seluruh jalan raya kemboja.

programme.title: Mat Moto
programme.desc: AL, seorang pemilik sebuah syarikat suntingan filem yang mengembara ke empat buah negeri untuk menunaikan hajat memiliki empat jenis helmet istimewa yang amat berharga dan digilai oleh penggemar motosikal di tanah air dengan ditemani oleh Sikha, seorang pelajar praktikal di pejabat AL. AL memberi Sikha sebuah kamera untuk merakam perjalanan mereka.

programme.desc: Adam yang baru tamat pengajian Usuluddin dari Jordan ialah anak penceramah selebriti, Dato Hj Muksin yang mahu menjodohkan Adam dengan anak jirannya. Ketika memberi kuliah subuh, Adam terlihat seorang gadis berbaju kurung kusam.

programme.title: Nur

programme.desc: Sekali lagi Nur menghilangkan diri. Adam mendapat nasihat Khadijah untuk mencari gadis itu untuk menjawab teka-tekinya selama ini. Di Darul Mukhsin pelajar disajikan dengan makanan tidak berkualiti dan tidak mencukupi.

programme.title: Nur

programme.title: Nur
programme.desc: Datuk Mukhsin masih belum buat keputusan untuk meneruskan kontrak untuk berceramah. Mahadi amat terdesak mengikut nafsunya terus mencari Nur. Adam pula susah melupakan gadis yang dijumpai di lorong gelap itu.

programme.desc: Bersama Hos, Shahrul Kamal membawa penonton mengembara dan mencuba pelbagai aktiviti luar di Forest 8 Senses, Tanjung Malim, Perak.

programme.title: Tinta Syurga
programme.desc: Dokumentari istimewa ini membawa penonton melihat misi menghasilkan mushaf (naskhah al-Quran bertulis tangan) untuk percetakan al-Quran di Malaysia. Ia berkongsi tentang proses penerbitan dan penerbitan al-Quran yang perlu melalui pelbagai peringkat tapisan.

programme.title: Misteri Mona Ku Serumu Kembali
programme.desc: Selepas Mona dilepaskan demi menyelamatkan anaknya, Anom dirawat di pusat psikiatri dan mengawal Mona sepenuhnya. Dakwaan pembunuhan rupanya halusinasi, menimbulkan persoalan tentang kebenaran sebenar di sebalik delusi Mona.

programme.title: 3 Nota Cinta

programme.title: HURU HARA
programme.desc: Huru hara ini membincangkan tentang dunia hiburan, perjalanan kerjaya tetamu jemputan dan persembahan artis. Artis jemputan pada episod kali ini adalah Hani Fadzil, NJWA, Alyssa Azmi dan Sufian Suhaimi.

programme.title: SEMBANG SELEBRITI
programme.desc: Sembang selebriti merupakan rancangan bual bicara bersama selebriti yang menceritakan tentang pengalaman mereka di dalam dunia seni tanahair yang boleh dijadikan sumber inspirasi. Episod kali ini menampilkan Killa Driz sebagai selebriti jemputan.

programme.title: Ölümlü Dünya
programme.desc: Keluarga Mermer menjalani kehidupan berganda dengan bekerja di restoran milik keluarga mereka sambil menjadi pembunuh upahan untuk sebuah organisasi antarabangsa. Selepas rahsia mereka terbongkar, keluarga yang tidak berfungsi ini perlu bekerjasama untuk terus hidup.

programme.title: Losmen Melati EP7
programme.desc: Melati, Golok, Sigit dan Ari bersiap sedia untuk melawan Kusno. Sara memasuki losmen mencari Fadil tetapi akhirnya terperangkap di salah satu bilik. Di sana, dia mendapati Fadil terperangkap dalam perigi dari episod 4. Diserang oleh roh rumah, Sara cuba menyelamatkan Fadil dan akhirnya mengorbankan dirinya dalam proses itu. Melati meyakinkan arwah rumah untuk berpihak kepadanya dalam perjuangannya menentang Kusno. Kusno dan Pemburu menyerang Losmen Melati. Sigit berbaik semula dengan Ari atas kengerian masa lalunya dan menentang ayahnya untuk kebaikan. Kini keluar dari perigi, Fadil cuba keluar dari rumah tetapi tersedut untuk melawan Kusno. Berjuang melawan Kusno sendiri, Fadil berada di ambang kematian apabila Kusno menggigitnya, membiarkan kutukan memasuki sistemnya. Apabila semua kelihatan hilang untuk Melati, dia mendedahkan senjata rahsianya - Watih, yang Kusno dipercayai telah mati, kembali untuk memberikan pukulan maut terakhir, akhirnya mengalahkan Kusno sekali dan untuk selama-lamanya. Namun apabila hari baru menjelma, Fadil muncul semula, tetapi semuanya tidak seperti yang disangka. Mata Fadil menjadi hitam, membayangkan kisah Losmen Melati belum berakhir.

programme.title: The Equalizer S3 EP3
programme.desc: Seorang ibu tunggal percaya suaminya yang sudah meninggal cuba membunuhnya dari alam lain. McCall dan pasukan menyiasat dakwaan pelik ini.

programme.title: Ganjil EP1
programme.desc: Nabila dan Amry bertembung di alam mimpi. Pada mulanya, masing-masing menganggap satu sama lain sebagai produk bawah sedar mereka. Mereka segera menyedari bahawa ini bukan mimpi biasa.

programme.title: Obsesi Dia EP12
programme.desc: Ritz semakin gelisah kerana Alia masih tidak pulang ke rumah. Dalam keadaan panik dia menghubungi Zacky dan secara tidak langsung mendedahkan identiti Alia. Adam yang diserang pengikut Amir diikat dan ditahan dalam sebuah pondok bersama Alia. Pihak polis tiba namun Amir sempat lari dengan mengheret Alia bersamanya. Adam berjaya menjejaki mereka dan menyelamatkan Alia setelah Amir terbunuh dalam pertarungan. Sementara itu, Zacky lega apabila bapanya menunjukkan tanda-tanda pulih. Dalam masa yang sama dia mengesyaki Sophie merancang sesuatu yang buruk. Rafeeq pula tidak dapat mengawal perasaan setelah mengetahui Affiyah masih hidup. Dibertekad untuk membunuh Affiyah dan Ritz.

programme.title: Sosok Ketiga
programme.desc: Apabila Nuri menerima Yuni yang merupakan sahabat baiknya, sebagai madunya, dia mencetuskan siri supernatural dan konflik mendalam bagi memenangi semula cinta hati suaminya.

programme.title: War Path
programme.desc: Seorang pembunuh kontrak menerima pekerjaan berbahaya yang tidak betul, meletakkan nyawa isterinya dalam bahaya.

programme.title: Dabbe Bir Cin Vakasi
programme.desc: Rumah sebuah keluarga di Turki dirasuk roh jahat yang ingin membunuh manusia.

programme.title: Ganjil
programme.desc: Nabila kehilangan rantai lehernya dalam mimpinya. Apabila Amry mencadangkan mereka mencari rantai di rumah Nabila, dia mendapati kebenaran yang tidak selesa.

programme.title: Detik 12 Malam EP15
programme.desc: Pengantara Detik 12 Malam iaitu Saiful Azmi Jamsari dengan dibantu krew produksi melakukan penyiasatan tentang kisah misteri. Minggu ini mereka berada kem de Bana bekas tapak PLKN di Bandar Seri Jempol, Negeri Sembilan. Pengantara menemu bual bekas Pengurus Kem PLKN de Bana Dato Anuar Rashidin. Diberitahu, beliau pernah diganggu oleh lembaga menakutkan semasa bekerja dan tinggal di situ. Yuzri Mohd Yunus, penjaga kem pula pernah mengalami peristiwa menakutkan apabila pelatihnya di rasuk. Naufal seorang penjejak Paranormal, pernah Terjumpa dengan lembaga menakutkan. Pengantara bersama krew kemudiannya melakukan penyiasatan dengan berada di lokasi tersebut selepas 12 malam. Pengantara sendiri mengalami kejadian seram apabila dapat merasakan kehadiran lembaga misteri di situ.

programme.title: Ganjil
programme.desc: Di alam mimpi, Nabila dan Mary bertemu dengan orang yang berkongsi luka mereka, diri mereka semasa kecil. Rahsia terbongkar semasa zaman kanak-kanak mereka berjalan mereka ke lorong ingatan.

programme.title: Losmen Melati EP7

programme.title: Dabbe Zehr-i Cin
programme.desc: Mengisahkan sebuah keluarga yang diganggu makhluk jin akibat perbuatan sihir dan iri hati. Teror mengerikan semakin memuncak apabila racun jin memusnahkan hubungan kekeluargaan, memaksa mereka mencari perlindungan melalui rawatan Islam dan ruqyah.

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: Filler

programme.title: Sebelum Titik Noktah EP5
programme.desc: Hariz terpaksa dibebaskan semula, dan saat inilah Hariz mahu larikan dirinya, dia kembali ke kabin yang mana dia lihat sudah berubah kedudukan, dia yakin pembunuh masih ada di situ. Banyak rahsia disimpan sang penulis novel ini kian dirungkai.

programme.title: Sosok Ketiga
programme.desc: Apabila Nuri menerima Yuni yang merupakan sahabat baiknya, sebagai madunya, dia mencetuskan siri supernatural dan konflik mendalam bagi memenangi semula cinta hati suaminya.

programme.title: Sembunyi: Amukan Azazil
programme.desc: Aishah, seorang wanita muda zaman penjajahan Jepun, terbangun di sebuah kampung sunyi yang kelihatan tidak terjejas oleh perang. Dia menemui rahsia gelap kampung itu serta makhluk jahat bernama Azazil yang memburu penduduk.

programme.title: Sebelum Titik Noktah EP5
programme.desc: Hariz terpaksa dibebaskan semula, dan saat inilah Hariz mahu larikan dirinya, dia kembali ke kabin yang mana dia lihat sudah berubah kedudukan, dia yakin pembunuh masih ada di situ. Banyak rahsia disimpan sang penulis novel ini kian dirungkai.

programme.title: Ganjil
programme.desc: Alam mimpi telah menjadi tempat percutian Nabila dan Amry. Semasa mereka berkongsi harapan dan ketakutan antara satu sama lain, mereka belajar tentang masalah yang harus mereka selesaikan dalam kehidupan masing-masing di dunia nyata.

programme.title: E Cinni
programme.desc: Sebuah film thriller Turki yang mengikuti seorang wanita yang terjerat dalam permainan kejahatan setelah mendapatkan akses ke teknologi yang berbahaya.

programme.title: Langit Tidak Selalu Cerah
programme.desc: Huzaimah gilakan kemewahan dan darjat sehingga sanggup meninggalkan suami dan anaknya demi mengejar kesenangan dunia. Dia berjaya menjadi seorang penyanyi namun telah diperdaya oleh Jeff, lelaki yang dianggapnya sebagai kekasih ke kancah pelacuran. Sedar dan ingin memohon maaf ke suami dan anaknya, dia mula mencari mereka. Namun, kemaafan itu tidak tercapai kerana pintu hati yang sudah tertutup. Kemudian, satu insiden telah membuka semula pintu hati mereka untuk memaafkan Huzaimah yang sedang menghidap HIV.

programme.title: Jeritan Batinku
programme.desc: Fauziah, seorang anak yatim yang sering didera ibu saudaranya, Ramlah, nekad melarikan diri ke bandar. Tindakannya itu telah membawanya ke Sharif yang bertindak menjadikannya sebagai anak angkat. Namun, kehadiran Fauziah tidak disenangi Mahani. Sikap cemburu Mahani hanya membawa padah kepada dirinya. Selain itu, perasaan serba salah Ramlah menyebabkannya mengalami tekanan jiwa. Mampukah Fauziah mengecapi kebahagiaan?

programme.title: Balada
programme.desc: Desa mewarisi sebidang tanah hasil penglibatan arwah ayahnya dalam politik tanah air - namun perlu ditebus tanah tersebut. Tidak mahu tanah itu beralih ke tangan orang lain, Desa perlu mencari wang secukupnya. Desa mula berhijrah ke Kuala Lumpur untuk mencari wang dengan bakatnya.

programme.title: Ribut Barat
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri, Adnan dan Azizah baru pulang ke tanah air selepas berkahwin di England. Azizah sering memandang rendah kepada keluarga suaminya yang berasal dari kampung. Adnan terlalu sayangkan isterinya sehingga sanggup melupakan ibu bapanya untuk menyenangkan hati isteri. Budaya barat yang diamalkan Adnan dan isterinya itu juga telah menyebabkan rumahtangga mereka retak menanti belah.

programme.title: Sayang Ibu
programme.desc: Setelah kematian bapa akibat satu kebakaran, kehidupan Tiara dan ibunya menjadi semakin sulit. Mereka berdua kemudiannya menumpang tinggal di sebuah pondok. Tiara mempunyai suara yang merdu dan dia berjaya menjadi seorang penyanyi di sebuah Syarikat rakaman. Ketika berada di kota, Tiara meminta jasa baik teman lelakinya untuk menguruskan hal ehwal ibunya di kampung. Namun, teman lelakinya itu menyalahgunakan wang yang diberikan oleh Tiara untuk ibunya.

programme.title: Reaksiar

programme.title: Ruang Temu
programme.desc: Program temu bual bersama Abdul Razak Mohaideen dan Saiful Apek yang mengupas pengalaman peribadi mereka berkaitan pengalaman mereka di dalam industri seni

programme.title: Hapuslah Air Matamu
programme.desc: Kisah tentang Aini, seorang penyanyi yang berasal dari kampung yang mula menempah nama selepas menjadi artis rakaman. Bermula sebagai seorang gadis yang sopan dan berbudi pekerti dan turut disokong oleh kekasihnya, Adi sehingga Aini berjaya menjadi penyanyi idaman ramai. Tetapi, Aini mula lupa diri selepas mengecapi kejayaan. Dia kemudiannya diberi peluang berkolaborasi bersama penyanyi terkenal Indonesia, Broery. Setelah itu, Aini menjadi semakin terkenal dan dia mula ditawarkan dengan bayaran yang tinggi untuk persembahannya. Kejayaannya telah mengubah Aini menjadi angkuh dan sombong sehingga dia mula melupakan janji lama dan juga ibunya. Dihina dan dimarahi oleh Aini, ibunya pulang dengan hati yang kecewa lalu jatuh sakit. Dapatkah Aini mengubat luka itu?

programme.title: Kad Cinta
programme.desc: Effa berhijrah ke ibu kota untuk mencari rezeki yang halal diperangkap masuk ke sindiket pelacuran yang sekelip mata mengubah hidupnya. Amri, seorang mekanik menolong Effa untuk keluar dari sindiket itu namun tragedi berlaku apabila Effa dibunuh dan Amri dijadikan suspek kepada pembunuhan itu. Amri mula mencari jalan untuk membersihkan namanya.

programme.title: Langit Petang
programme.desc: Seorang wartawan muda, Hafiz ingin membantu kekasihnya, Ruby. Ruby bergelut untuk mengatasi trauma dan pengalaman buruk dari zaman kecilnya. Hafiz sedang menulis rencana tentang kisah Pak Arif yang memiliki tanah pusaka di kampung. Hashim pula ingin membeli kesemua tanah miliknya dan menggunakan taktik jahat untuk mendapatkannya. Ternyata, Ruby adalah anak saudara kepada Pak Arif.

programme.title: Langit Tidak Selalu Cerah
programme.desc: Huzaimah gilakan kemewahan dan darjat sehingga sanggup meninggalkan suami dan anaknya demi mengejar kesenangan dunia. Dia berjaya menjadi seorang penyanyi namun telah diperdaya oleh Jeff, lelaki yang dianggapnya sebagai kekasih ke kancah pelacuran. Sedar dan ingin memohon maaf ke suami dan anaknya, dia mula mencari mereka. Namun, kemaafan itu tidak tercapai kerana pintu hati yang sudah tertutup. Kemudian, satu insiden telah membuka semula pintu hati mereka untuk memaafkan Huzaimah yang sedang menghidap HIV.

programme.desc: 10 peserta dari daerah berbeza akan berentap dalam mengetengahkan Sajian Terbaik Sarawak melalui pertandingan realiti yang mencungkil bakat dan kemahiran anak jati Sarawak dalam bidang kulinari makanan tempatan untuk merebut kejuaraan dan dinobatkan sebagai Raja Nyaman!

programme.desc: TVS Pagi membawakan perkembangan menyeluruh dari dalam dan luar negara.

programme.title: (DL) World News
programme.desc: Delivers timely and in-depth coverage of key global events, focusing on international politics, economics, and societal changes, with a spotlight on the latest developments impacting the world today.

programme.title: Fat Buddies
programme.desc: Seorang bekas agen rahsia “J” yang cedera dan menjadi obes selepas misi, masih bertekad menjalankan tugas penting. Dalam perjalanannya ke Jepun untuk mendapatkan dokumen sulit, dia bertemu seorang pengawal keselamatan besar badan, Hao Yingjun. Mereka tak dijangka bekerjasama dalam satu misi komedi berbahaya melibatkan sindiket dadah, penuh aksi lucu, cabaran pelik dan situasi goofy sepanjang pengembaraan mereka.

programme.title: The Swords Woman
programme.desc: Di era Dinasti Ming, anak perempuan seorang pegawai tinggi menjadi buruan selepas keluarganya diburu akibat politik istana. Semasa melarikan diri, dia bertemu seorang sarjana dan bersama mereka mempertahankan diri daripada musuh sambil mencari kebebasan dan keadilan. Filem ini terkenal dengan aksi pedang klasik wuxia dan adegan seni mempertahankan diri yang berpengaruh dalam sejarah filem Asia.

programme.title: Zharfa
programme.desc: Filem ini mengisahkan Zharfa, seorang gadis Malaysia yang penuh pemberontakan dan emosional, sejak ditinggalkan oleh ayah kandungnya ketika berusia satu tahun. Selepas ibunya berkahwin dengan lelaki licik, konflik antara Zharfa dan bapa tirinya semakin memuncak. Akhirnya, dia dihantar ke sebuah pesantren di pedalaman Jawa Barat, Indonesia, di mana wataknya terus berkembang dalam latar budaya dan agama yang kuat

programme.title: Reaksiar
programme.desc: Program yang memaparkan perkongsian pengalaman dan reaksi artis-artis jemputan setelah melihat kembali klip-klip lakonan mereka.

programme.title: Sampai 7 Keturunan
programme.desc: Dalam satu peraduan cabutan bertuah, Aidil telah terpilih untuk memenangi percutian lima hari empat malam di sebuah hotel lima bintang serta wang tunai sebanyak lima ribu ringgit. Namun begitu, disebabkan isterinya Syikin yang sedang hamil, Aidil memutuskan untuk tidak mengambil percutian tersebut. Walaupun begitu, Aidil berasa sayang untuk melepaskan hadiah itu begitu sahaja. Dia memberikan wang tunai dan tiket tersebut kepada Pak Karim, yang pada mulanya keberatan untuk menerimanya kerana bimbang meninggalkan ayam kesayangannya. Setelah dipujuk berkali-kali, Pak Karim akhirnya bersetuju walaupun masih risaukan ayamnya.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit (2018)
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit yang nakal sering mencuri hasil tanaman di kebun Tuan McGregor. Namun apabila cucu Tuan McGregor berpindah ke rumah tersebut, Peter dan rakan-rakannya terlibat dalam persaingan lucu untuk merebut kawalan kebun — dan perhatian jiran cantik mereka, Bea.

programme.title: One, Two, Trivia
programme.desc: Sebuah program yang merungkai fakta-fakta menarik yang tersimpan dalam filem-filem klasik tempatan

programme.title: Kasut Ku Kusut
programme.desc: Kasut Ku Kusut mengisahkan seorang pemuda kampung bernama Manap yang berasa kecewa kerana kasut barunya telah hilang. Sementara itu, Markos, ahli kumpulan gangster Father Dragon, ditugaskan untuk membawa Suzi kepada ketua geng. Dalam perjalanan, mereka tersesat di sebuah kampung, dan Suzi berjaya melarikan diri lalu bertemu dengan Manap yang masih mencari kasutnya. Ketika Markos menemui mereka, Manap menyedari bahawa kasut yang dipakai oleh Markos kelihatan sangat mirip dengan kasutnya yang hilang.

programme.title: Ruang Temu
programme.desc: Program temu bual bersama Tony Eusoff yang mengupas pengalaman peribadi beliau berkaitan pengalaman beliau di dalam industri seni

programme.title: Hantu Tok Mudim
programme.desc: Sekumpulan lelaki muda cuba menakutkan penduduk kampung dengan cerita hantu Tok Mudim untuk mengaut keuntungan, tapi akhirnya mereka sendiri terjerat dalam situasi lucu

programme.title: The Pursuit Of Happyness
programme.desc: Chris Gardner, seorang ayah tunggal, menghadapi kesusahan kewangan selepas pelaburan perniagaannya gagal. Dia berjuang untuk mencari pekerjaan sambil menjaga anaknya, Christopher. Kisah ini menunjukkan ketabahan, pengorbanan dan harapan, ketika Chris berusaha mengubah nasib hidup mereka dan mencapai impiannya walaupun melalui cabaran yang berat.

programme.title: Surga Di Telapak Kaki Ibu
programme.desc: Kisah Bayu, remaja yang hidup bersama ibunya setelah ayahnya meninggal. Bayu merasa tertekan kerana kemiskinan dan sering menyalahkan ibunya atas nasib mereka. Namun, ketika ibunya jatuh sakit, Bayu mula menyedari kasih sayang dan pengorbanan besar seorang ibu serta pentingnya taat dan berbakti kepadanya.

programme.title: Melawan Takdir
programme.desc: Filem ni kisahkan perjalanan hidup Quraisy Mathar sendiri (pengarah filem ni). Ia mengangkat pengalaman hidupnya yang penuh cabaran sejak kecil — kehilangan orang tersayang, jatuh bangun dalam hidup, sampai berjaya jadi seorang sineas. Cerita ni tunjuk bagaimana semangat, doa, dan keyakinan boleh buat seseorang bangkit walaupun diuji dengan pelbagai takdir yang pahit.

programme.title: Ketika Cinta Bertasbih
programme.desc: Cerita tentang Azzam, seorang pemuda yang berpegang teguh pada nilai-nilai Islam, berusaha menuntut ilmu sambil mengekalkan cinta kepada Tsuraya. Mereka menghadapi pelbagai ujian, konflik keluarga, dan rintangan sosial, namun keyakinan dan keimanan membimbing mereka menempuh cabaran cinta dan kehidupan.

programme.title: Ketika Cinta Bertasbih 2
programme.desc: Lanjutan dari Ketika Cinta Bertasbih yang mengisahkan Azzam kembali ke Indonesia selepas 9 tahun belajar di Kairo. Walaupun sudah bergelar sarjana, dia sukar cari kerja dan dipengaruhi tekanan masyarakat. Sambil menambah pengalaman berniaga, Azzam juga berdepan konflik cinta apabila wanita yang dicintainya telah dipinang sahabatnya, sementara Eliana yang menyukainya sendiri belum dapat diterimanya sebagai pilihan hati.

programme.title: Calon Presiden
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Saleha
programme.desc: Saleha mengisahkan seorang gadis baik hati yang ditinggalkan oleh ayahnya dan dibesarkan oleh nenek. Selepas diculik dan kehilangan neneknya, dia dipersalahkan dan dihalau oleh keluarganya. Dengan semangat dan keimanan yang teguh, Saleha memulakan hidup baru di Jakarta sambil menyembunyikan penyakit serius.

programme.title: Harta Warisan Pembawa Kutukan
programme.desc: Sejurus selepas pengebumian ayah mereka, Ratna mendesak agar harta pusaka dibahagikan segera. Sikap tamaknya mengundang kemarahan Fadli dan membawa Ratna ke dalam satu kutukan yang mengerikan.

programme.title: Cinta Di Ujung Sajadah
programme.desc: Rindu dan Fauzan terpaksa berdepan dengan kenyataan pahit apabila penipuan masa lalu Rindu terbongkar. Fauzan yang marah mengusir Rindu keluar dari rumah, dan Rindu berjuang untuk mendapatkan hak penjagaan anak mereka, Ayu. Dalam penyesalan, Fauzan mula menyedari bahawa cintanya terhadap Rindu masih belum padam. Namun, segalanya menjadi rumit apabila Fauzan berkahwin dengan wanita lain bernama Alia. Di sisi lain, Rindu berkenalan dengan Hafiz yang benar-benar menyayanginya.

programme.title: Satu Cinta Dua Hati
programme.desc: Rumah tangga Salwa dan Fahri dikurniakan dua cahaya mata iaitu Nayla dan Arsya. Perkahwinan yang pada asalnya penuh kebahagiaan kini berakhir dengan duka apabila Fahri memutuskan untuk meninggalkan keluarganya bagi merantau ke bandar demi mengejar kejayaan. Dalam usaha menyara kedua anaknya, Salwa bekerja keras setelah ditinggalkan suaminya. Namun, keamanan keluarga kecil ini diganggu oleh peristiwa besar yang berlaku di rumah mereka.

programme.title: Satu Cinta Dua Hati
programme.desc: Rumah tangga Salwa dan Fahri dikurniakan dua cahaya mata iaitu Nayla dan Arsya. Perkahwinan yang pada asalnya penuh kebahagiaan kini berakhir dengan duka apabila Fahri memutuskan untuk meninggalkan keluarganya bagi merantau ke bandar demi mengejar kejayaan. programme.title: Jalan-Jalan Sultan
programme.desc: Pengacara-pengacara meneroka beberapa destinasi pelancongan terbaik di Indonesia, dan bertanya soalan kepada beberapa pengunjung. Mereka yang menjawab dengan betul akan menerima hadiah.

programme.title: D'Academy 7
programme.desc: D' Academy 7 ialah musim ketujuh rancangan nyanyian popular Indonesia yang fokus pada muzik dangdut. Peserta dari seluruh negara bertanding dengan menyanyikan lagu dangdut, menunjukkan bakat vokal dan persembahan mereka. Sepanjang musim, mereka dinilai oleh juri profesional dan undian penonton. Siapakah yang akan menjuarai D'Academy musim ketujuh?

programme.title: Saleha
programme.desc: Saleha mengisahkan seorang gadis baik hati yang ditinggalkan oleh ayahnya dan dibesarkan oleh nenek. Selepas diculik dan kehilangan neneknya, dia dipersalahkan dan dihalau oleh keluarganya. Dengan semangat dan keimanan yang teguh, Saleha memulakan hidup baru di Jakarta sambil menyembunyikan penyakit serius.

programme.title: Kata Ustadz Solmed
programme.desc: Kata Ustadz Solmed merupakan program bual bicara yang dibimbing oleh pengacara dan ustaz terkenal yang akan fokus membincangkan tentang masalah yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat sehinggalah masalah rumah tangga dari sudut agama.

programme.title: Cinta Di Ujung Sajadah
programme.desc: Rindu dan Fauzan terpaksa berdepan dengan kenyataan pahit apabila penipuan masa lalu Rindu terbongkar. Fauzan yang marah mengusir Rindu keluar dari rumah, dan Rindu berjuang untuk mendapatkan hak penjagaan anak mereka, Ayu. programme.title: Istri Serakah Lurah Yang Amanah
programme.desc: Dewi (Sylvia Fully) dan Haris (Rexy Rizky) ialah pasangan suami isteri, dengan Haris sebagai ketua kampung yang amanah, manakala Dewi bersikap tamak dan gilakan harta. Dewi menyalahgunakan jawatan Haris dengan menyelewengkan wang bantuan sosial ke akaun peribadinya, sehingga penduduk menyalahkan Haris apabila bantuan gagal disalurkan. Apabila kebenaran terbongkar, Haris murka dan menuntut Dewi menghentikan perbuatannya.

programme.title: AKSI 2025
programme.desc: Seramai 28 orang ustaz dan ustazah dari pelbagai wilayah di Indonesia bertanding merebut kejuaraan melalui pelbagai interaksi menghiburkan serta aktiviti Islam yang penuh bermakna.

programme.title: D'Academy 6
programme.desc: D'Academy Musim 6 (DA6) merupakan acara pencarian bakat menyanyi dangdut untuk musim keenam D'Academy.

programme.title: Calon Presiden
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: THE ATTORNEY
programme.desc: When tax attorney Song Woo-Suk agrees to defend a student activist who was arrested and tortured into giving a false confession, his entire life and worldview begin to change drastically.

programme.title: ROAD TO BOSTON
programme.desc: A group of marathoners want to run proudly under the Korean flag after Korea's liberation. Though they couldn't afford a pair of sneakers, they embark on an unforgettable journey to Boston.

programme.title: PENINSULA
programme.desc: Set four years after the zombie outbreak, a former soldier and his team return to the zombie-infested wastelands to retrieve a truck of money and try to escape from it alive.

programme.title: SPIRITWALKER
programme.desc: A man loses memory and wakes up in a new body every 12 hours. In search of his identity, he met a woman who claims to know him.

programme.title: THE EXCLUSIVE: BEAT THE DEVIL'S TATTOO
programme.desc: When a journalist discovers that his exclusive story on a serial killer was based on false information, he fabricates more lies to cover his mistake.

programme.title: LOVE 911
programme.desc: A doctor tries to woo a grieving, widowed firefighter in her attempt to get him to testify on her behalf in a medical malpractice case.

programme.title: HEAR ME: OUR SUMMER
programme.desc: Yong-jun is working as a delivery man when he meets and instantly falls for Yeo-reum, the devoted sister of a gifted deaf swimmer. Yeo-reum slowly opens her heart to warm-hearted Yong-jun.

programme.title: THE ROUNDUP: NO WAY OUT
programme.desc: There is a drug case links to an organized crime organization in Japan. Despite the expanding scale of the case, the beast cop and his team strive their best to arrest the criminal...

programme.title: OMNISCIENT READER: THE PROPHECY
programme.desc: Dok-ja is the only reader of an obscure web novel for 10 years. Suddenly, the apocalyptic world of the novel becomes reality. He and the novel's omnipotent hero strive to save the world.

programme.title: HITMAN: AGENT JUN
programme.desc: While under the influence of alcohol, an unsuccessful comic book writer draws a comic about his life as a former NIS hitman, and runs into trouble when it gets posted online.

programme.title: THE TIGER
programme.desc: While the Kingdom of Korea is under occupation by the Japanese, an old and experienced hunter is challenged by the hunt of the last tiger in the country.

programme.title: A MELODY TO REMEMBER
programme.desc: Amidst the Korean War in 1952, Lt. Han Sang-Ryul formed a choir with the orphaned refugee children in Busan, finding solace and purpose through music, despite the hardships of war.

programme.title: OFFICE
programme.desc: The investigation following a sales manager brutally killing his entire family leads to a track of mystery and tragedy in an overwhelmed work team at Seoul.

programme.title: Chansung's Cooking
programme.desc: 2PM's Chansung will explore different restaurants, taste popular menus and recreate them with his own recipes!

programme.title: You Can Cook With Sam Kim
programme.desc: Star chef Sam Kim will teach you how to make all kinds of delicious dishes - from Italian pasta, Spanish food to desserts! Follow his easy recipes and enjoy cooking!

programme.title: Yumi's Cells
programme.desc: Adapted from the popular webtoon of the same title, it tells the story of an ordinary office worker Yumi through the eyes of her brain cells, which controlled her thoughts, feelings and actions.

programme.title: Yumi's Cells
programme.desc: Adapted from the popular webtoon of the same title, it tells the story of an ordinary office worker Yumi through the eyes of her brain cells, which controlled her thoughts, feelings and actions.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: A mermaid from the Joseon period ends up in present-day Seoul, where she crosses paths with a swindler who may have ties to someone from her past.

programme.title: Cha's Family
programme.desc: From Thailand to Japan, the cast explore bold local flavors, craft their own signature spicy sauce, and bring Korea's passion for heat to a global stage—mixing food, culture, and adventure into one sizzling journey.

programme.title: You Can Cook With Sam Kim
programme.desc: Star chef Sam Kim will teach you how to make all kinds of delicious dishes - from Italian pasta, Spanish food to desserts! Follow his easy recipes and enjoy cooking!

programme.title: Fresh off the Sea
programme.desc: Yum Jung-ah, Ahn Eun-jin, Park Jun-myun, Dex and special guests are visiting seaside villages in Korea. They will live there and cook fresh seasonal dishes using ingredients from the sea.

programme.title: Dear X
programme.desc: Dear X follows Baek Ah-jin, a top actress who leverages her beauty and popularity to further her career through manipulation. She harbors a lot of grudges behind her somewhat good-natured demeanor.

programme.title: Muscle Farmers
programme.desc: 5 'muscle farmers' land a helping hand to rural areas that face a labor shortage crisis. Join them in Korea's first agricultural-physical project as they enter the world of farming!

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: A mermaid from the Joseon period ends up in present-day Seoul, where she crosses paths with a swindler who may have ties to someone from her past.

programme.title: Chansung's Cooking

programme.title: Walking Through The Village
programme.desc: Actor Gu Bon-seung shows the warmth and purity of life in the village along the river, and presents how new history was made and became one's memory.

programme.title: You Can Cook With Sam Kim
programme.desc: Star chef Sam Kim will teach you how to make all kinds of delicious dishes - from Italian pasta, Spanish food to desserts! Follow his easy recipes and enjoy cooking!

programme.title: I-LAND2 : N/a
programme.desc: Girl version of ENHYPEN is coming! The ultimate survival variety program by top producer TEDDY, following the creation of the next generation K-pop girl group.

programme.title: Golden Bowl
programme.desc: Man's Noodles is passed down to the current generation. Man Shui (Raymond Cho), Man Nin (Hugo Wong) and Man Sai (Mark Ma) have learned the craft from their father and opened their own noodle shops. However, three shops on the same street have resulted in destructive competition. Lung Kau (Mayanne Mak), Fok Siu-yuk (Ashley Chu) and Kam Chi (Kamen Kong) are their wives respectively. They often quarrel as they earnestly defend their husbands. The siblings' mother Madam Man Ji Chin-hung (Nancy Sit) has not intervened in the feud between her three sons as she is faced with a dilemma. Just before CNY's Eve, Chin-hung sees her late husband in her dream. He brings up the topic of sibling rivalry and tells Chin-hung to restore things to order. Chin-hung then uses the legend of the Mans' Golden Bowl, which was bestowed by the Emperor, as an excuse for luring her three sons into temporarily staying at their old home from first to seventh of January. Chin-hung pretends to observe her sons and their family members' behavior which she uses as a basis for deciding who is the Golden Bowl winner. In fact, she hopes to unite everybody through participation by the three families in traditional CNY activities.

programme.title: The Runner
programme.desc: Web media editor Ho Ka-yan (Elaine Yiu) encounters track and field coach Yuen Nik (Joel Chan) as she is assigned the task of approaching the Windchasers Club and digging up scandalous dirt. Because of some past regrettable incident, Yuen Nik avoids socializing with other people. But he is getting closer and closer to Ka-yan as he repeatedly mingles with her. Kwok Bui-yee (Tiffany Lau), daughter of tycoon Kwok Wong-po (Ram Chiang), eagerly joins Windchasers as she has some ulterior motive. However, Wong-po and Yuen Nik keep agitating each other as Wong-po becomes Windchasers' sponsor. Yuen Nik's buddy Lai Shun-fan (Max Cheung) asks Yuen Nik to look after his young son Mak Yu-sun. The duo gradually develop an amicable mentor-disciple relationship. And Shun-fan and Ka-yan actually had some emotional issues. Shun-fan then becomes self-destructive due to some serious illness. Yuen Nik is determined to make him pick himself up. Meanwhile, Yuen Nik takes a good look at himself as he wants to again set foot on the runway.

programme.title: STEP INTO THE PAST, A
programme.desc: HONG SHIU LUNG (KOO TIN LOK, LOUIS) is an secret agent in the 21st Century. He joins a pilot programme to fly back in time hoping that he will salvage his unforgettable love. However, something goes wrong during the mission. He is sent back to the Warring States Period. Emperor QI (LAM RAYMOND) has not been crowned yet and is kept hostage in Chiu. In order to return to the future, LUNG decides to help QI become emperor. With his wisdom and Kungfu, he is recognized and given important tasks. A modern man in the wrong era, he is bound to face difficulties. Before QI becomes emperor, LUNG is poisoned, attacked and seduced. He even gets involved in political wars. He was born a romantic man, and even though he is in a totally different time and space, he still manages to get into a love rectangle with a princess, an intellectual and a tycoon's daughter.

programme.title: Law dis-Order
programme.desc: As the founder of the leading Chinese law firm, CHEUK KAI-YIU (Lau Dan) has been re-elected as chairman of the committee for many terms. Though he promised managing partner LAU KING-CHANG (Liu Kai Chi) that he would step down, he deliberately brings in a materialistic lawyer called CHEUNG KEUNG (Alex Fong) to counterbalance KING-CHANG's obsession with power. For years, KING-CHANG has built up significant influence in the company and his associates include YAM WAI-LEUNG (Raymond Cho) and FONG NING (Mandy Wong). Thinking he could easily handle his opponent CHEUNG KEUNG's allies namely LEE SIU-WAH (Florence Kwok) and CHOW LIK-HANG (Matthew Ho), a traffic accident catches him off guard. Taking advantage of the situation, CHEUNG KEUNG gets himself a lucrative offer from KAI-YIU to become a senior partner, and even re-encounters lawyer CHEUK YI-CHUN (Ali Lee) in the process. YI-CHUN, who has a special position in the company, initially looks down on CHEUNG KEUNG but later grows fond of him. The two form a peer mentoring relationship, forcing KING-CHANG, the power-obsessed "time bomb", to finally fess up. With the descent into infighting of the whole firm, a toothless tiger that has managed to stay under the radar for years is seeking revenge......

programme.title: Law dis-Order
programme.desc: As the founder of the leading Chinese law firm, CHEUK KAI-YIU (Lau Dan) has been re-elected as chairman of the committee for many terms. programme.title: Happy Ever After
programme.desc: TUNG KOON (AU YEUNG CHUN WAH, BOBBY) born with a special 'King's Tongue' is betrayed by his assistant, SIU SIU (CHAN MIU YING, MARIANE) who had prepared some chili source without permission. TUNG is accused of deceiving the Emperor and is forced to flee from Guangzhou to the capital. When SIU discovered that someone had used her to trap TUNG, she sees TUNG in person and apologizes. TUNG and SIU eventually reconcile. Love feeling blossoms between them. They join together to cook a very delicious 'Marinated Lung Slice'. The Emperor, KIN LUNG (KWONG WA) loves it very much and offer TUNG to work in the palace kitchen. Since then TUNG becomes one of the Emperor's favourite officials. TUNG's good friend, MIN LEUNG (KWOK CHUN ON) gains an official title with his wife, TSUI FA (LEUNG NGAI LING, FIONA)'s support. However, LEUNG abandons FA because of the reunion with his old lover, SIN YUNG (CHEONG WAI YEE, ANGIE). In order not to ruin LEUNG's reputation, FA tolerates. Unexpectedly, YUNG accepts bribes secretly on behalf of LEUNG. YUNG's act ruins LEUNG's future….

With the descent into infighting of the whole firm, a toothless tiger that has managed to stay under the radar for years is seeking revenge......

programme.title: Law dis-Order
programme.desc: As the founder of the leading Chinese law firm, CHEUK KAI-YIU (Lau Dan) has been re-elected as chairman of the committee for many terms. Though he promised managing partner LAU KING-CHANG (Liu Kai Chi) that he would step down, he deliberately brings in a materialistic lawyer called CHEUNG KEUNG (Alex Fong) to counterbalance KING-CHANG's obsession with power. For years, KING-CHANG has built up significant influence in the company and his associates include YAM WAI-LEUNG (Raymond Cho) and FONG NING (Mandy Wong). Thinking he could easily handle his opponent CHEUNG KEUNG's allies namely LEE SIU-WAH (Florence Kwok) and CHOW LIK-HANG (Matthew Ho), a traffic accident catches him off guard. Taking advantage of the situation, CHEUNG KEUNG gets himself a lucrative offer from KAI-YIU to become a senior partner, and even re-encounters lawyer CHEUK YI-CHUN (Ali Lee) in the process. YI-CHUN, who has a special position in the company, initially looks down on CHEUNG KEUNG but later grows fond of him. The two form a peer mentoring relationship, forcing KING-CHANG, the power-obsessed "time bomb", to finally fess up. With the descent into infighting of the whole firm, a toothless tiger that has managed to stay under the radar for years is seeking revenge......

programme.title: Silver Chamber Of Sorrows, The
programme.desc: “Sheung's Silver Chamber”, the largest jewel company in Foshan, Guangdong Province China, is facing serious financial difficulties. In order to obtain a loan from SHUM's family, SHEUNG HANG (Chun Pui), owner of the Chamber, together with his primary wife, CHOI SIU-DIP (Sit Ka Yin), plot to arrange marriage between SHEUNG WAN (Ng Wai Kwok), HANG's younger brother, and SHUM WING-TUNG (Young Yuen Yee), daughter of SHUM's family. Fueled by hatred, CHING SAU-HANG (Ng Wing Mei), WAN's lover, marries HANG and ironically becomes WAN's sister-in-law. WAN falls out with HANG, and opts to live abroad and disconnects from his family. After leaving home for years, WAN does not return home until the occasion to celebrate his father's birthday. Tension between the two brothers comes to a head when HANG is reluctant to pay ransom to save the youngest son of WAN. WAN is determined to disconnect completely from his family ever since. Since WAN's return, SAU-HANG suffers from her husband's neglect and gets framed for causing the fourth concubine FEI FEI's (Wu Ting Yan) miscarriage. Hatred leads her to commit act that revenge. She seeks to subvert SHEUNG's family by luring KWAN. Intentionally, she unveils TSAU KUK (Yeung Sze Ki), the maid in the family, is HANG's illegitimate daughter. The dark age of a once-prominent family begins…

programme.title: Hello Missfortune
programme.desc: In a multidimensional domain, Poon Siu-yu (Erica Chan) enters the second dimension after her death in the first dimension, i.e. the mortal realm. She then joins Office of the Life Authority and becomes a novice “destiny administrator”. Siu-yu has to keep a close watch on food courier Chan Pei-ho (Hubert Wu), who is in the mortal realm. Pei-ho earns a meager living regardless of the weather. But his family members just do not care about him. He is already overwhelmed by life pressures, and he is also jinxed by “bad spirit” Siu-yu while doing his job. Siu-yu gradually sympathizes with Pei-ho. Meanwhile, Pei-ho also realizes this mysterious girl has covertly helped him a lot. The duo then even recklessly start a romantic relationship that is probably going to have no future.

programme.title: Pages Of Treasures
programme.desc: Bookshop staff FONG HOK MAN (Chun Pui) always believes that “knowledge is power”. He tries hard to encourage his older son FONG SUM MING (Lai Yiu Cheung) and his younger son FONG SUM CHING (Suen Eric) to study more. Unfortunately, MING is not good at studying at all and he quits after secondary school. On the other hand, CHING is a very smart boy and MING works hard overseas to support CHING's further studies on computer sciences in America. The two brothers return to Hong Kong eventually and they work in the same commercial building. CHING works as a senior network security engineer while MING works as a junior security guard. MAN worries that the difference in their job ranking will hinder their relationship. MING admires a girl YUEN WAI CHUNG (Kwok Sonija) who opens a paper mud figure shop. MAN tries to help MING establish his career by buying a secondhand bookshop for him to operate. However, MAN doesn't realize that the virtual world is gradually manipulating his family. CHING meets a romanticist TSU HEI MAN (Yeo Vivien) at work which creates misunderstanding between him and his girlfriend, LUI YUEN YI (Yeung Shirley). MAN's younger daughter FONG SUM MEI (Ho Lily) indulges herself in the virtual world and she is suspected for stealing exam papers on the internet…

MAN's younger daughter FONG SUM MEI (Ho Lily) indulges herself in the virtual world and she is suspected for stealing exam papers on the internet…

programme.title: Legend Of Master Chai, The
programme.desc: In Heaven, Chai (Leung Wing Chun) killed Huen (Ho Po Sang) over a pot of sweet lotus seed soup. He was expelled to earth to suffer, while at the same time, he had to help Huen and Nui, who were also sent down to earth, to regain their powers. Chai was punished to become the stupid and shabby son, of an earthly man. Huen, on the other hand, was his handsome and clever brother, who was loved by all. One day, Chai regained his magic power and started to challenge Huen. Their relationship worsened as they both fell in love with Nui (Leung Siu Bing)…

programme.title: Good Morning Hong Kong
programme.desc: Report important news about Hong Kong, cross-strait, and international affairs.

programme.title: Who Wants A Baby?
programme.desc: An unexpected pregnancy catches couple TONG TIM-YEE (Ali Lee) and IP CHI-TING (Lai Lok Yi) off guard. They depend on their mothers for baby-sitting, but conflict ensues when the in-laws' parenting skills are poles apart. The emotionally wrought and physically challenging experience of caring for their baby girl 24/7 leaves them no other choice but to hire an experienced confinement nanny, WONG KAI-MIU (Griselda Yeung), to help them. The arrival of her newborn forces TIM-YEE to give up her fashion career; whereas CHI-TING has to say goodbye to his relaxing and enjoyable nightlife. In order to spend more time to look after her daughter, TIM-YEE changes her career to take over a post-natal care agency. With KAI-MIU pulling a few strings, TIM-YEE gets to know many expectant couples and nannies. In her role as a new mom, she is struck with a newfound appreciation, but feels like she and her husband CHI-TING are growing apart. On top of that, she even suspects that he has an affair with his coworker bartender HUI CHING (Samantha Ko). Surprisingly, CHI-TING captivates the internet after bravely saving a child in an accident, and is dubbed the “greatest dad” ever, which makes the agency a childcare KOL, turning things upside down……

programme.title: Sustainable in Constructio
programme.desc: Hong Kong, with its towering skyscrapers, is a veritable "concrete jungle." The concrete used in construction releases a large amount of carbon dioxide during its production, making it the largest source of greenhouse gases after coal, oil, and natural gas. Therefore, countries worldwide are actively developing more environmentally friendly building materials to achieve net-zero emissions by 2050. This program, "Carbon Reduction & Building Footprints," interviews various experts and industry professionals to analyze the use and evolution of concrete, and explores the advantages of adding special additives to concrete, as well as their benefits to society and the environment. It encourages the industry to use sustainable materials more widely, preparing for a "low-carbon transition"!

programme.title: Hands Up 2026
programme.desc: The brand-new children's program “Hands Up” encourages kids to ask questions bravely, express themselves, and pursue their goals! Members of the mascot “Sauce Family” join the hosts in performing short skits, accompanying everyone for joyful moments. The show will also feature a variety of children's songs, allowing kids to sing along while learning practical life knowledge.

programme.title: Legal Mavericks 2020
programme.desc: Blind barrister Man Sun-hop (Vincent Wong), aka Perception Man, has a superlative fourth sense. He teams up with female legal executive Chiu Ching-mui (Sisley Choi) and private investigator Kut Yat-ha (Owen Cheung) to seek justice for the underprivileged. They never hesitate to use tactics that involve “pushing the boundaries”. Barrister Shaw Mei-la (Kelly Cheung) earnestly approaches Sun-hop. They are then to fight it out in court. Also, Mei-la's pupil master Kan Siu-wang (Paul Chun) constantly back Mei-la up. While Sun-hop was serving his pupillage with his pupil master Siu-wang, a homicide case involving some missing corpse had caused Shifu and his disciple to become foes. Sun-hop presents new evidence and lodges an appeal for the defendant. He and Siu-wang again confront each other, causing successive rounds of conflict. Meanwhile, the emergence of Mei-la brings about subtle changes in the formidable Sun-hop, Ching-mui and Yat-ha's triangular relationship.

programme.title: Legal Mavericks 2020

programme.title: Scoop 2026
programme.desc: "Scoop" airs from Monday to Sunday, closely following major social events and interesting stories, while also reporting the latest updates in the entertainment industry, celebrity news, as well as drama promotions and behind-the-scenes features. The "Today's Breaking News" segment keeps viewers up to date with the day's hottest stories. The in-depth feature section explores current affairs, social, and livelihood issues that the public cares about, interviewing relevant experts for their insights.

programme.title: Food Mister
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered what fictional dishes in literature would taste like? The flavors of the food described by authors are left to the reader's interpretation; however, it's not entirely impossible to cook them in reality. The host invites celebrity chefs to find creative inspiration from TV series, video games, cartoons, and literary classics, discovering some of the featured dishes mentioned within them, and then, through the skillful hands of these master chefs, "recreating" these seemingly unreal dishes. Can these fantastical dishes actually be cooked? Or are they merely the creators' fantasies? The program immerses viewers in a culinary world where fantasy and reality intertwine!

programme.title: Sustainable in Constructio
programme.desc: Hong Kong, with its towering skyscrapers, is a veritable "concrete jungle." The concrete used in construction releases a large amount of carbon dioxide during its production, making it the largest source of greenhouse gases after coal, oil, and natural gas. Therefore, countries worldwide are actively developing more environmentally friendly building materials to achieve net-zero emissions by 2050. This program, "Carbon Reduction & Building Footprints," interviews various experts and industry professionals to analyze the use and evolution of concrete, and explores the advantages of adding special additives to concrete, as well as their benefits to society and the environment. It encourages the industry to use sustainable materials more widely, preparing for a "low-carbon transition"!

programme.title: ChatSAT
programme.desc: It will do its utmost to gather the trendiest and latest information from around the world, covering everything from global events, medical encyclopedias, arts, and technology to daily life and trending online topics, sharing them with the audience every Saturday. By discussing everything under the sun and chatting about the hottest topics, “Group friend” listeners can easily stay up to date with global trends by following the program.

programme.title: Midlife, Sing & Shine! 4
programme.desc: " Midlife, Sing & Shine! 4" has officially launched, continuing the success of the previous three seasons and once again providing a stage for singing enthusiasts to pursue their dreams. This season expands its recruitment efforts to North America and Australia, with several TVB artists participating "masked," igniting the flame of music globally and illuminating the hearts of countless dreamers. Stephanie Che continues to host, offering her warm smile to the contestants; Maria Cordero, Chow Kwok-fung, Cheung Ka-tim, Hai-er, and Gu Ya-wei also serve as judges, providing professional feedback and encouragement to the participants. On this new season's stage, everyone will weave an even more moving chapter with music, continuing the heartfelt story of " Midlife, Sing & Shine! 4."

programme.title: 2026 Feng Shui and Fortune
programme.desc: 2026, the Year of the Fire Horse in the Chinese lunar calendar, is a "Red Horse" that occurs only once every sixty years, traditionally considered a year of change and challenge. "Leading the Way with Great Fortune" combines metaphysical knowledge with the festive atmosphere of the Lunar New Year, bringing positive energy to ward off misfortune and usher in a new beginning for the Red Horse Year, helping everyone achieve success! Masters Lee Shing-chak and Mak Ling-ling will provide guidance to artists from metaphysical perspectives, including annual fortune and face reading. The masters will also lead a team to the Greater Bay Area to introduce local cultural customs. In addition, other masters will share practical metaphysical tips based on their respective areas of expertise to further enhance their fortune in the Year of the Horse.

programme.title: Star Weekly
programme.desc: The talk show "Star Weekly" invites celebrities and industry leaders each episode, along with entertainment anchors such as Au Wing-Kuen, Hsu Wen-Hsuan, and Wang Chen-Chuan, to share their recent work plans and discuss special topics related to movies, television, and concerts, especially people and events that netizens and friends in the industry are concerned about and discussing! With so much surrounding information, the show features a special "Fact Check" segment, where guests personally respond to various rumors, allowing the parties involved to clarify the truth!

programme.title: Vital Lifeline
programme.desc: Urban dwellers often experience a hectic pace of life and high levels of stress, making them more susceptible to health problems. "The Strongest Lifeline" helps you unravel the secrets to good health. To start, the program features a four-episode series on common urban pain issues, covering headaches, shoulder and neck pain, back pain, and joint pain. Each episode invites medical experts to explain the causes of these conditions, as well as physical therapists and exercise specialists to teach appropriate exercises. With the growing trend of integrating Eastern and Western medicine, even American swimming champion Michael Phelps uses cupping therapy to relieve pain. Therefore, each episode also includes traditional Chinese medical diagnosis, complemented by treatments such as acupuncture, cupping, and the “Sanfu” herbal patch therapy, which is especially suitable during the hottest days of summer. In addition, Chinese medicine practitioners share recipes for nourishing soups, all of which can help regulate and improve your health.

programme.title: Not Far From Here
programme.desc: Even with limited vacation time, you can still embark on a trip to explore the Greater Bay Area, thanks to "Not Far From Here"!C Kwan,Billy Luk and Karen Wu team up to uncover travel information, savoring modern Cantonese cuisine, top-notch vegetarian dishes, exquisite French food, and the delightful Omakase dessert. A sensory feast of exotic insects awaits. Immerse yourself in a jazz whiskey bar, enjoying vinyl music and stand-up comedy performances. Leisure and entertainment abound, including luxurious massage treatments, a five-star buffet, and a variety of recreational facilities. What's it like to experience a storm-themed spa? Dress up and enjoy an escape room adventure - thrilling enough! The team will also visit trendy areas and Western antique museums to find their favorite items.

programme.title: ChatSAT
programme.desc: It will do its utmost to gather the trendiest and latest information from around the world, covering everything from global events, medical encyclopedias, arts, and technology to daily life and trending online topics, sharing them with the audience every Saturday. By discussing everything under the sun and chatting about the hottest topics, “Group friend” listeners can easily stay up to date with global trends by following the program.

programme.title: Gourmet Express
programme.desc: Hong Kong brings together global cuisines, and its unique dishes and down-to-earth fare have captured the close attention of discerning food lovers! Food hosts and presenters such as Icy Wong,Snowy Choi,Carmen Ngai,Carmaney Wong , Jessica Liu , Gillian Ng keep up with the latest food news and deals, delving into the stories behind the flavors. Gathering firsthand information on popular eateries across various platforms, the hosts personally line up and taste the food, providing genuine reviews. Even takeout-only eateries with no dine-in option are in high demand—what are the must-try picks? Running a food business inevitably comes with its own mix of sweet, sour, bitter, and spicy experiences. The production team follows the proprietors through their busy day, from sourcing ingredients and preparing materials to opening for business, uncovering the "stories behind the flavors."

programme.title: News At 18:30
programme.desc: Jade Channel reports important local, cross-strait, and international news every afternoon at 6:30.

programme.title: News Magazine 2026 & Trick Or Cheat
programme.desc: "News Perspective" is a weekly program featuring in-depth coverage of notable news stories from Hong Kong and around the world. It focuses on social issues that matter most to Hong Kong residents and invites people from various sectors, scholars, and experts to discuss and analyze the underlying causes and developments.

programme.title: Scoop 2026
programme.desc: "Scoop" airs from Monday to Sunday, closely following major social events and interesting stories, while also reporting the latest updates in the entertainment industry, celebrity news, as well as drama promotions and behind-the-scenes features. The "Today's Breaking News" segment keeps viewers up to date with the day's hottest stories. The in-depth feature section explores current affairs, social, and livelihood issues that the public cares about, interviewing relevant experts for their insights.

programme.title: 2026 Feng Shui and Fortune
programme.desc: 2026, the Year of the Fire Horse in the Chinese lunar calendar, is a "Red Horse" that occurs only once every sixty years, traditionally considered a year of change and challenge. "Leading the Way with Great Fortune" combines metaphysical knowledge with the festive atmosphere of the Lunar New Year, bringing positive energy to ward off misfortune and usher in a new beginning for the Red Horse Year, helping everyone achieve success! Masters Lee Shing-chak and Mak Ling-ling will provide guidance to artists from metaphysical perspectives, including annual fortune and face reading. The masters will also lead a team to the Greater Bay Area to introduce local cultural customs. In addition, other masters will share practical metaphysical tips based on their respective areas of expertise to further enhance their fortune in the Year of the Horse.

programme.title: Music Money Monster
programme.desc: Pushing the limits of vocal range and precise timing, the brand-new interactive music game show Music Money Monster" is hosted by Sammy, Eric Kwok, and Lee Yin-tung. A professional pitch analysis system tests the contestants. A nine-square grid represents nine difficulty levels. Contestants who connect three lines to "pass the level" can choose to withdraw their winnings, continue the challenge, or even attempt the most difficult Monster level. Failure results in zero prize money! The amateur version allows solo participants to compete for a top prize of NT$100,000. The celebrity version offers viewers a chance to win prizes and gifts by interacting with the contestants in the live stream and sending emojis to cheer them on.

programme.title: J Music 2026
programme.desc: J Music is dedicated to creating a high-quality music platform, providing singers with opportunities to showcase their musical talents while allowing music fans to gain a deeper understanding of their musical stories. The program invites popular singers as guests, who personally select their favorite new and old works, perform them live, and share their favorite tracks. New faces in the music scene will also appear, showcasing their musical potential through interactive exchanges. Furthermore, each episode closely follows the latest developments on the Jade Solid Gold Chart, featuring music videos and interviews with various singers, songwriters, and producers, who discuss their work and the people and events within the music industry.

programme.title: Christian's Choice
programme.desc: Hong Kong's culinary industry has been buffeted by the pandemic, economic downturn, and a surge in consumer spending in mainland China, putting its precious culinary culture at risk. Some restaurants remain steadfast, honing their craft day after day, adapting to changing circumstances. They're sharing these challenging times with their customers through exceptional culinary skills and delicious cuisine, a journey that brings growth to the community. Adhering to the principles of authentic, independently owned restaurants with a long history, host Christian Yang curates a selection of "Friends" restaurants, exploring the hidden, heartwarming stories behind these establishments, tasting their extraordinary signature dishes, and appreciating the fighting spirit of Hong Kong's culinary culture.

programme.title: News Roundup
programme.desc: Reporting major news from Hong Kong, across the Taiwan Strait, and around the world, as well as sports updates, keeping you informed about important events and trends in the world of sports.

programme.title: ChatSAT
programme.desc: It will do its utmost to gather the trendiest and latest information from around the world, covering everything from global events, medical encyclopedias, arts, and technology to daily life and trending online topics, sharing them with the audience every Saturday. By discussing everything under the sun and chatting about the hottest topics, “Group friend” listeners can easily stay up to date with global trends by following the program.

programme.title: News Magazine 2026
programme.desc: "News Perspective" is a weekly program featuring in-depth coverage of notable news stories from Hong Kong and around the world. It focuses on social issues that matter most to Hong Kong residents and invites people from various sectors, scholars, and experts to discuss and analyze the underlying causes and developments.

programme.title: Sustainable in Constructio
programme.desc: Hong Kong, with its towering skyscrapers, is a veritable "concrete jungle." The concrete used in construction releases a large amount of carbon dioxide during its production, making it the largest source of greenhouse gases after coal, oil, and natural gas. Therefore, countries worldwide are actively developing more environmentally friendly building materials to achieve net-zero emissions by 2050. This program, "Carbon Reduction & Building Footprints," interviews various experts and industry professionals to analyze the use and evolution of concrete, and explores the advantages of adding special additives to concrete, as well as their benefits to society and the environment. It encourages the industry to use sustainable materials more widely, preparing for a "low-carbon transition"!

programme.title: The Taste Of Us
programme.desc: Delicious food, bursting with color, aroma, and flavor, not only fills the stomach but also soothes the soul! Liangliang (Mason Fung), a freelancer who loves singing and food, is feeling lost after breaking up with his girlfriend Jessica (Carmen Ngai). To prove his financial independence, he rents out his vacant room. His tenant, Azhi (Zeno Koo ), is a cooking enthusiast who frequently unleashes his culinary skills, creating a variety of heartwarming dishes such as "Miso Clam Soup" and "Chicken and Avocado Mexican Rolls"... The two young men hit it off immediately, satisfying each other's hunger and filling each other's voids! What kind of interesting relationship will these two very different personalities build?

programme.title: 2026 Feng Shui and Fortune
programme.desc: 2026, the Year of the Fire Horse in the Chinese lunar calendar, is a "Red Horse" that occurs only once every sixty years, traditionally considered a year of change and challenge. "Leading the Way with Great Fortune" combines metaphysical knowledge with the festive atmosphere of the Lunar New Year, bringing positive energy to ward off misfortune and usher in a new beginning for the Red Horse Year, helping everyone achieve success! Masters Lee Shing-chak and Mak Ling-ling will provide guidance to artists from metaphysical perspectives, including annual fortune and face reading. The masters will also lead a team to the Greater Bay Area to introduce local cultural customs. In addition, other masters will share practical metaphysical tips based on their respective areas of expertise to further enhance their fortune in the Year of the Horse.

programme.title: Music Money Monster
programme.desc: Pushing the limits of vocal range and precise timing, the brand-new interactive music game show Music Money Monster" is hosted by Sammy, Eric Kwok, and Lee Yin-tung. A professional pitch analysis system tests the contestants. A nine-square grid represents nine difficulty levels. Contestants who connect three lines to "pass the level" can choose to withdraw their winnings, continue the challenge, or even attempt the most difficult Monster level. Failure results in zero prize money! The amateur version allows solo participants to compete for a top prize of NT$100,000. The celebrity version offers viewers a chance to win prizes and gifts by interacting with the contestants in the live stream and sending emojis to cheer them on.

programme.title: Scoop 2026
programme.desc: "Scoop" airs from Monday to Sunday, closely following major social events and interesting stories, while also reporting the latest updates in the entertainment industry, celebrity news, as well as drama promotions and behind-the-scenes features. The "Today's Breaking News" segment keeps viewers up to date with the day's hottest stories. The in-depth feature section explores current affairs, social, and livelihood issues that the public cares about, interviewing relevant experts for their insights.

programme.title: J Music 2026
programme.desc: J Music is dedicated to creating a high-quality music platform, providing singers with opportunities to showcase their musical talents while allowing music fans to gain a deeper understanding of their musical stories. The program invites popular singers as guests, who personally select their favorite new and old works, perform them live, and share their favorite tracks. New faces in the music scene will also appear, showcasing their musical potential through interactive exchanges. Furthermore, each episode closely follows the latest developments on the Jade Solid Gold Chart, featuring music videos and interviews with various singers, songwriters, and producers, who discuss their work and the people and events within the music industry.

programme.title: Not Far From Here
programme.desc: Even with limited vacation time, you can still embark on a trip to explore the Greater Bay Area, thanks to "Not Far From Here"!C Kwan,Billy Luk and Karen Wu team up to uncover travel information, savoring modern Cantonese cuisine, top-notch vegetarian dishes, exquisite French food, and the delightful Omakase dessert. A sensory feast of exotic insects awaits. Immerse yourself in a jazz whiskey bar, enjoying vinyl music and stand-up comedy performances. Leisure and entertainment abound, including luxurious massage treatments, a five-star buffet, and a variety of recreational facilities. What's it like to experience a storm-themed spa? Dress up and enjoy an escape room adventure - thrilling enough! The team will also visit trendy areas and Western antique museums to find their favorite items.

In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.desc: Chu-Tsai Chao and his wife have five children. Having devoted his entire life to developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai sincerely hopes that one of his children will follow in his footsteps and take over the family business. However, he also respects their individual passions and aspirations. Because of their fathers dream of innovation, the lives of the Chao brothers are about to change.
