When he learns she has only six months to live, he decides to marry her and fulfill her dream wedding. Eight days later, she mysteriously disappears, and Shi De vows not to let true love slip away again.

programme.title: CNY - Blessing of Formosa
programme.desc: In this episode, the hosts travel across Taiwan during the New Year season, visiting temple communities and lively night markets in the north, central, and south. Through local traditions and everyday interactions, the programme captures the festive atmosphere and cultural charm of Taiwans temple night markets.

programme.title: Crypto Storm
programme.desc: ICAC investigation officer Lok sets up a special team to investigate a corruption case involving a bank's top executive's use of cryptocurrency to manipulate the trading market. When the bank's chairman is kidnapped and kidnappers demand ransom in crypto coins, Lok connects the dots and vows to hunt down the mastermind behind both crimes.

programme.title: Let's Get Rich
programme.desc: The Jia family, a group of talented Taiwanese con artists, is recruited by a fraudster to expose a corrupt tech tycoon's Ponzi scheme and to steal millions from him through a complex deception plan.

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: Fat Choi Spirit
programme.desc: Andy is a mahjong master who is very popular in the neighbourhood. However, after being cursed by his ex-girlfriend, Andy always experiences bad luck when playing mahjong. Can he finally dodge this streak of bad luck?

programme.title: Way We Talk, The
programme.desc: This is a soul-searching story about three youths: Wolf, Sophie and Alan, each living with a different form of deafness. Through sign language, they cultivate a profound friendship and offer each other unwavering support. United by love and friendship, the trio embarks on a journey of self-discovery and resilience.

programme.title: Happy Dragons
programme.desc: Four retired secret agents embark on a quest for the "Golden Relic" triggered by a mahjong game. Their journey unexpectedly transports them back 30 years, restoring their youth. While striving to rectify their past mistakes, the agents unravel a hidden conspiracy along the way.

programme.title: The Unwavering Brotherhood
programme.desc: The revered elder of a triad gang faces succession uncertainty when his three trusted underlings—Hua, Fei, and Guo—are robbed while transporting gang money. Determined to redeem himself, Hua vows to track down the robbers. However, when Hua discovers that Fei and Guo are connected to the robbery, he must choose between loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau II
programme.desc: Mark, the chief accountant of a money-laundering syndicate, has stolen US$15 billion from the fund and absconded to Thailand with his daughter. Interpol agent Lok seeks help from Ken, the God of Gamblers, to capture the syndicate's mastermind. As they search for Mark to testify in the case, Ken reunites with the love of his life…

programme.title: Out of Order
programme.desc: A successful lawyer's secret affair turns into a nightmare when a corpse unexpectedly turns up in the hotel room, triggering a desperate cover-up that spirals into uncontrollable chaos.

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 2
programme.desc: Fanny appears to be an ordinary housewife but is in fact a mahjong expert. Deeply in love with her husband, she loses to a seductive woman, Curvy, both on the mahjong table and in competing for her husband's love. With the help from her mahjong master, Fanny vows to take on Curvy in the Mahjong King tournament!

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau III
programme.desc: Ken holds a wedding ceremony in Macau for his daughter Rainbow. However, an explosion during the wedding causes Rainbow to fall into coma, while Ken and his friend Mark, are accused of engulfing some illicit money. Enraged, Ken swears to seek vengeance and pursue the mastermind who has gotten them involved in his evil plan.

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: Teddy, once a renowned movie star, is facing a career decline. To make a living, he accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. Teddy's career regains momentum after he reunites with his long-lost daughter, but he is also confronted by a rival at the same time. His daughter and disciples decide to help him overcome this difficult situation…

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: It's a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: Hong Kong tycoon Ren Da Kuan takes care of his family that spans four generations, yet his three sons grapple with their own challenges. Everything changes when his daughter returns from studying in France with her friend Roberto. Roberto brings a wave of transformation to the Ren family, sparking new hope and opportunities for all.

programme.title: Flying Swords of Dragon Gate
programme.desc: This is a remake of the original 1966 classic, Dragon Gate Inn. The country is being policed by the East and West Bureaus, whilst the Emperor's eunuchs have attained much power and control. With all the corruption, Zhao teams up with a group of assassins to systemically kill the eunuchs in order to save the country.

programme.title: Cat vs Rat
programme.desc: Zhan and Bai are equally matched in martial arts skills. Bai saves the Emperor one day but did not believe in his identity and rejects a promotion. When Zhan is promoted to the royal guard after saving the Emperor, Bai gets angry and tries to prank him by stealing the imperial jade seal. Luckily, Zhan is able to retrieve the seal with his skills.

programme.title: Murderer Pursues
programme.desc: Wang Chung was a valued actor long before he became a director, but as a filmmaker, he helped create some of the most interesting thrillers Shaw Brothers ever released - including this fascinating crime saga of a Sino-Vietnamese crime gang. Danny Lee stars as a misunderstood refugee while Ray Lui plays a cop struggling against his own conscience to ensure that justice is upheld.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: Death Duel
programme.desc: Third Master is a renowned swordsman in the martial arts world, but the constant challenges by other swordsmen compel him to fake his death and pursue a secluded life. This does not prevent others from seeking him out to challenge him however, and he is forced to return to fight his way till the end.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperor's death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: The Killer Has No Return
programme.desc: Professional killer Lui goes to Malaysia after completing his mission of killing the big boss of a Hong Kong gang. His next target is a groom who is throwing his wedding banquet at a hotel in Chinatown. Just when Lui takes aim at his target, another victim instead of the groom is shot, and he becomes a scapegoat in this mystery assassination.

programme.title: Hex after Hex
programme.desc: Hell may have no fury like a woman scorned, but hell literally, really has no wrath like a lusting ghost scorned! Cult classic director Kuei Chih-hung shoots the works with this amazing horror romance starring muscular "Venom" Lo Meng.

programme.title: My Rebellious Son
programme.desc: A corrupt official attempts to steal a priceless Buddha statue from a temple to please a group of Westerners. Luckily, Doctor Zhang and his son manage to defeat the Western boxers, the Japanese Kendo opponents and the Western longsword fighters with Chinese kung fu, thus saving the Buddha statue.

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: Roving Swordsman
programme.desc: An ambitious evil clan intends to rule the martial arts world. To achieve their goal, they must first steal a secret martial arts manuscript depicting how firearms can be produced. However, a supremely intelligent swordsman Shen Sheng Yi is protecting the manuscript and remains one step ahead of the evil clan.

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: Adapted from the classic Chinese novel of the same title, the story follows Monk Tang San Zang's journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing.

programme.title: Legendary Weapons Of China
programme.desc: Lei Kung, the leader of the Boxer Clan in Yunnan, dissolves the clan to save his disciples before going into self-exile. The Clan sends various assassins to kill him but failed. They then assigned Kung's brother Yong to find and kill Kung, leading to a battle between the two brothers.

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: Brothers from the Walled City
programme.desc: Two orphaned brothers growing up in Kowloon's Walled City - the place where people are forced to live with indecent businesses of sex, gambling and drugs controlled by triads - take very different life paths. Chin works at a cabaret but keeps away from sins, while Kang is drawn to the sleazy underworld. Are their destinies shaped by the “walls”?

programme.title: The Kid With The Golden Arm
programme.desc: The government hires Yang to escort a cargo of gold to a famine stricken area. The vicious Chi Sha gang, with one of their best fighters, Golden Arm, announce their intention to hijack it by killing one of Yang's employees. As Yang gathers his own team of reputable fighters to protect his cargo, are they strong enough to hold off Golden Arm?

programme.title: Masooda
programme.desc: A single mother Neelam and her daughter Nazia face horror as an evil force intrudes. With help from neighbor Gopi, they confront danger and persevere.

(Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense), who raised him and developed his extraordinary paranormal gifts. Despite his dark origins, Hellboy becomes an unlikely champion for good, battling the evil forces that threaten our world along with a telepathic “mer-man” (Doug Jones) and a “pyro-kinetic” (Selma Blair). programme.title: Arabian Seas
programme.desc: The seas are alive with carnivores. Meet the sharks and rays who patrol the coral reefs, hunting down their prey. Learn about toxic fish who disguise themselves to ambush the unwary, and armoured predators who devour vulnerable targets.

programme.title: Arabian Seas
programme.desc: Arabia's coral reefs are home to some of nature's most impressive illusionists. Creatures can pulsate with colour, transform in the blink of an eye, or perform riveting displays of showmanship. Because in these dangerous waters, disguise is crucial.

programme.title: Arabian Seas
programme.desc: Off the coast of Oman, summer weather drives nutrients in from the ocean depths where they meet the Arabian sun, causing an explosion of life. Smaller fish spawn, filling the waters with eggs. This creates a buffet predators just can't resist.

programme.title: Arabian Seas
programme.desc: It's summer in the Gulf of Oman. The scorching Arabian sun heats the shallow waters to 86 degrees boosting the growth of algae across a vast coral reef. This attracts thousands of hungry herbivores creating a fish versus fish turf war.

programme.title: Arabian Seas
programme.desc: The sea turtle is one of the oldest animals on earth. These ancient mariners even pre-date the dinosaurs. They have existed, relatively unchanged, for over 100 million years. But now, all seven of the surviving species are endangered.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands
programme.desc: Endure winter and early spring on the west coast, where animals eke out a chilly existence. Watch red deer battle on windswept Inishvickillane, welcome seal pups amid howling storms on the Inishkea islands, and view the return of the basking sharks.

programme.title: Uptown Otters
programme.desc: Swim upriver with the Bay Family, where Anna offers a hand raising her grandpups before heading home to find interlopers on her turf. Watch a flood in the mangroves nearly sweep away a baby, and see the Townies eat clean through their resources.

programme.title: Uptown Otters
programme.desc: Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.title: Uptown Otters
programme.desc: Welcome Anna's clan back to Marina Bay, where two otter families have been trespassing. Feel the heat when Mia catches Anna's scent and hustles the Townies out of reach. Then hold tight as the Nomads remain blissfully unaware of the coming conflict.

programme.title: Uptown Otters
programme.desc: Follow the Bay Family's matriarch as she chases the Nomads out of her territory for good, and examine the surprising birthing den where the Townies' leader, Mia, settles in. Then kick back with the Mangrove Family as they pal around with stray dogs.

programme.title: Uptown Otters
programme.desc: Chase Anna to the Townies' lair, where Mia and her newborn pups are hiding out. See the babies' first swimming lessons before the clan moves to new digs, and welcome an era of otter peace as the Mangrove Family becomes a park's main attraction.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters
programme.desc: Spotty, a female hyena cub, is destined to be leader of the Chimbwe clan that lives in the heart of Zambia's Luangwa Valley. But she has yet to prove herself. Witness her fight to find her place in this savagely competitive family.

programme.title: Gladiators
programme.desc: Witness clashes over precious resources when the dry season brings a band of gladiators to an African savannah watering hole. See a lion-elephant territory brawl, an ant raid on a termite mound, and a honey badger's risky dance with a deadly snake.

programme.title: Gladiators
programme.desc: Go up against Australia's wiliest gladiators and their impressive arsenals. Learn if these weapons, such as the kangaroo's deadly boxing moves and the redback spider's precision-engineered traps, can help them survive the ravages of climate change.

programme.title: Gladiators
programme.desc: Cheer as young gladiators earn their stripes in the dense tropical forests of the Americas. Stand back as a poison dart frog launches a toxic barrage, observe a jaguar-caiman turf war, and see a hungry coati cross paths with a defensive tarantula.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons
programme.desc: Surviving the African savanna requires guile and teamwork for species who live in packs. Follow a day in the life of African wild dogs and dwarf mongooses to see how they rely on their tight-knit families to overcome the challenging landscape.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons
programme.desc: A complex web of relationships rules all life on earth: all species are interconnected, none can survive in isolation. While some relationships are one-sided, others are mutually beneficial. From loose associations to tight-knit partnerships, everything has a place in nature's great scheme. Complex interactions between species are not even limited to animals, and some of the best examples occur in the lush mountain forests of Africa.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons
programme.desc: The Nile crocodile and hippopotamus are two of Africa's amphibious freshwater icons, found in waterways, rivers and lakes across the continent, including the stunning wilderness of Kwa-Zulu Natal in South Africa. These two species have co-existed for thousands of years, evolving in different ways to a life aquatic.

programme.title: Battle Of The Alphas

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms
programme.desc: For most of the year it's a desert, but during early August and September the dusty valleys of Namaqualand transform into a wonderland carpeted with wildflowers. Witness this magnificent transformation from arid desert to beautiful oasis.

programme.desc: Explore the southern edge of the Pantanal, where brown capuchin monkeys live in their own Garden of Eden. Dry season in the highlands treats them well until a drought dries up their food sources. Can an industrious agouti save them from starvation?

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won't find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today's world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.desc: Xinjiang On The Road merupakan sebuah program dokumentari pendek berkonsep rekreasi yang dibuat penggambaran di wilayah Xinjiang, China. Menampilkan barisan wartawan dan pempengaruh dari Malaysia, Thailand dan China. Kesemua mereka akan berhadapan cabaran sukan musik sejuk, menyediakan makanan tempatan dan berinteraksi dengan adat resam rakyat, program ini membawa penonton dalam perjalanan untuk menikmati keindahan landskap dan warisan budaya Xinjiang.

programme.desc: Tribal Kitchen is a documentary series that offer a rare and intimate look into the daily lives and evolving culture of Malaysia's indigenous people, told throught their food and communities. programme.title: Fadhilat Ramadan
programme.desc: Fadilat Ramadan ialah keistimewaan yang Allah SWT kurniakan dalam bulan yang mulia ini, di mana pahala amalan dilipatgandakan dan dosa diampunkan bagi mereka yang berpuasa dengan ikhlas. Ramadan juga bulan turunnya al-Quran dan mengandungi Lailatul Qadar yang lebih baik daripada seribu bulan. Bulan ini penuh rahmat, keberkatan dan peluang untuk mendekatkan diri kepada Allah SWT.

programme.title: Dua Sisi
programme.desc: Dua Sisi ialah sebuah rancangan bual bicara dan debat berprestij yang menggabungkan tiga elemen utama dalam satu program: perdebatan intelektual, wacana bersama tokoh elit, dan sokongan kepada komuniti usahawan. Diterajui oleh pendekatan eksklusif dan gaya penyampaian yang intelek, rancangan ini menampilkan tokoh-tokoh berpengaruh, pendebat cemerlang, dan pemilik perniagaan dalam satu pentas yang sama— membicarakan isu-isu semasa dari dua sisi pandang.

programme.title: UFC 325: Volkanovski vs. Lopes 2 - Prelims
programme.desc: On Sunday, February 1, UFC returns to Sydney Olympic Park, New South Wales, Australia for UFC 325 which will be headlined by a featherweight championship rematch between titleholder Alexander “The Great” Volkanovski and challenger Diego Lopes. The duo faced off for the vacant featherweight title last April at UFC 314 in Miami, with Volkanovski earning a unanimous decision victory to reclaim in the throne in the 145-pound weight class.

programme.title: UFC Main Event - UFC297 - Strickland vs Du Plessis
programme.desc: UFC Middleweight Champion Sean Strickland defends his title against South African contender Dricus Du Plessis in a thrilling showdown at UFC 297. Watch the full championship fight on this episode of Main Event.

programme.title: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 GOALS - LIGUE 1 TOP 10 GOALS
programme.desc: Power, precision, perfection. Ligue 1’s top 10 goals of 22/23 were of the highest order.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 - 2
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola - 17
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback - UFC Fight Flashback 1002: Usman vs. Covington 2
programme.desc: UFC 268 was headlined by the heated rematch between welterweight king Kamaru “The Nigerian Nightmare” Usman and Colby “Chaos” Covington. Relive their incredible battle with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Connected - 801 - UFC Connected "Origins: Themba Gorimbo, Unbreakable: Njokuani Brothers, Warrior Code: Dricus du Plessis
programme.desc: UFC welterweight Themba Gorimbo reveals how he overcame a life of hardship and adversity, from the trenches of the African gold mines to the biggest stage in MMA. Chidi Njokuani details his life-long journey to the octagon under the guidance and mentorship of his brother Anthony Njokuani, former UFC lightweight contender. UFC Middleweight Champion Dricus du Plessis reveals his keys to success in the octagon.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed - 1803 - Lightweight Title
programme.desc: When Khabib Nurmagomedov retired from MMA, the UFC’s lightweight title was up for grabs. See the journey of the 155-pound belt following the Khabib Era on UFC Unleashed. Featuring Charles Oliveira, Dustin Poirier, Islam Makhachev, and more.

programme.desc: At UFC 304 in Manchester, England, UFC Welterweight champion Leon "Rocky" Edwards defends his title against Belal "Remember the Name" Muhammad in a highly anticipated rematch.

Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
